"Walking on Sunshine" by Katrina & The Waves - This song is a feel-good anthem that would get me pumped up and energized for the day ahead.
"Happy" by Pharrell Williams - Who wouldn't want to start their day off with a song that's all about being happy? This song would put a big smile on my face and set the tone for a joyful day.
"Unwritten" by Natasha Bedingfield - This song is all about embracing the unknown and making the most of every moment. It would be a great reminder to stay positive and focused on my goals.
"Roar" by Katy Perry - This empowering anthem would be a great way to start the day, reminding me to be confident and stand up for myself.
"Best Day of My Life" by American Authors - This song is a catchy and upbeat tune that would get me pumped up and excited for whatever the day may bring.
